metadata.name: Remote Code Execute via Winrm.vbs
metadata.comment: Detects an attempt to execute code or create service on remote host via winrm.vbs.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cscript.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('winrm')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke create wmicimv2/win32_')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r:http')))

output.summary: Detects an attempt to execute code or create service on remote host via winrm.vbs.
